name: PieChartAndBand
summary: This library help you create simple circular meter (like a speedometer) and a band view
description: The library is build to create simple pie charts and band bars, to help devs simplify their work if they need similar stuffs. This is the basic implementation I have done here in a just a couple of days. Will be doing some more customisations to it in some time. Meanwhile if you need any customisation to it, please reach out to me over email: shobhit_chou@yahoo.com. I will try to get it done ASAP. Cheers.
